alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 11:55PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected with total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Frontier County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be dangerous to nearly impossible. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, including whiteout conditions at times. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
